wikipedia_page.main: Sir Robert Sidney Foster  (11 August 1913 – 12 October 2005) was a British colonial administrator, best remembered as the last colonial Governor of Fiji and the first Governor-General of the Dominion of Fiji. He had previously served as Governor of the Solomon Islands and as High Commissioner for the Western Pacific (positions that briefly overlapped with his tenure as Governor of Fiji).

response: * Robert Sidney Foster (1913–2005), governor-general of Fiji
# Sir Robert Sidney Foster 10 October 1970 – 13 February 1973

Government Archivist Setareki Tale said it was possible that the then-Governor-General, Sir Robert Sidney Foster, had returned the document to the United Kingdom - but that was only conjecture. The British High Commission might be asked to help in the search for the document, government sources said.
*Robert Sidney Foster, British Governor of Fiji
